row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY
! -------------- Decrypt Password ------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_AD_PWD#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :SET &UC4RB_DECR_PWD# = "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD"
:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 10 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_AD_DC#, ".") :SET &DC# = "" :SET &I# = 1 :WHILE &I# <= 10 : IF &ARRAY#[&I#] <> "" : IF &I# = 1 : SET &DC# = "dc=&ARRAY#[&I#]" : ELSE : SET &DC# = "&DC#,dc=&ARRAY#[&I#]" : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &I# = ADD(&I#, 1) :ENDWHILE :P &DC#
:IF &UC4RB_AD_EMAIL# <> "" : SET &EMAIL# = "-email &UC4RB_AD_EMAIL#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AD_OU# <> "" : SET &OU# = ",ou=&UC4RB_AD_OU#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AD_CONTAINER# <> "" : SET &CONTAINER# = ",cn=&UC4RB_AD_CONTAINER#" :ENDIF
! -------------- Powershell Commands -------------------
$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"
Import-Module ActiveDirectory
dsadd user "cn=&UC4RB_AD_FIRST_NAME# &UC4RB_AD_LAST_NAME#&OU#&CONTAINER#,&DC#" -samid &UC4RB_AD_LOGIN# -upn &UC4RB_AD_LOGIN# -pwd &UC4RB_DECR_PWD# -mustchpwd &UC4RB_AD_CHANGE_PWD# -fn &UC4RB_AD_FIRST_NAME# -ln &UC4RB_AD_LAST_NAME# &EMAIL# -pwdneverexpires &UC4RB_AD_PWD_EXP# 2>&1
if ($? -eq $true) { write-host "The following user was created successfully:" get-aduser &UC4RB_AD_LOGIN# }
! ------------------------------------------------------
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
